scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c cyan,magenta "bun run src/server.ts" "cd frontend && bun run dev"
scripts.test: find tests -name '._*.ts' -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true; bun test
scripts.lint: find tests -name '._*.ts' -type f -delete 2>/dev/null || true; bun test --filter never
